short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension that downloads shopping history from currently viewed Food Lion page as a CSV

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Allows you to download a CSV file containing your shopping history from the Food Lion web site.

How to use:
1. Install the Extension
2. Visit the Shopping History page in your Food Lion account
3. An icon will appear in the search bar
4. Click the icon and a CSV file will be downloaded containing the shopping history
